report.title: Autofeed occurrences for Elasticsearch (standard filters, no website limit)
report.description: A list of occurrences designed for feeding into Elasticsearch or a similar JSON store. No website limit so designed to collect records from all website registrations.
report.count_query: SELECT count(*) FROM filtered_occurrences o WHERE 1=1

column.name: taxon_key
column.sql: coalesce(cttl.search_code, cttl.external_key)

column.name: day_of_year
column.sql: case o.date_type when 'D' then extract(doy from o.date_start) else null end

column.name: week
column.sql: case when coalesce(date_part('year', o.date_start), 0)=coalesce(date_part('year', o.date_end), 0) and coalesce(floor(extract(doy from o.date_start)/7+1), 0)=coalesce(floor(extract(doy from o.date_end)/7+1), 0) then coalesce(floor(extract(doy from o.date_start)/7+1), 0) else null end

column.name: ukbms_week
column.sql: case when coalesce(date_part('year', o.date_start), 0)=coalesce(date_part('year', o.date_end), 0) and floor((extract('doy' from o.date_start) - extract('doy' from (extract('year' from o.date_start) || '-04-01')::date))/7) = floor((extract('doy' from o.date_end) - extract('doy' from (extract('year' from o.date_end) || '-04-01')::date))/7) then floor((extract('doy' from o.date_start) - extract('doy' from (extract('year' from o.date_start) || '-04-01')::date))/7) + 1 else null end

column.name: month
column.sql: case when coalesce(date_part('year', o.date_start), 0)=coalesce(date_part('year', o.date_end), 0) and coalesce(date_part('month', o.date_start), 0)=coalesce(date_part('month', o.date_end), 0) then coalesce(date_part('month', o.date_start), 0) else null end

column.name: year
column.sql: case when coalesce(date_part('year', o.date_start), 0)=coalesce(date_part('year', o.date_end), 0) then coalesce(date_part('year', o.date_start), null) else null end

column.name: geom
column.sql: st_astext(st_removerepeatedpoints(st_transform(o.public_geom, 4326)))

column.name: point
column.sql: st_y(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom), 4326))::text || ',' || st_x(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom), 4326))::text

column.name: map_sq_srid
column.sql: COALESCE(get_output_srid(o.public_geom), 3857)

column.name: map_sq_1km
column.sql: CASE WHEN onf.sensitivity_precision > 1000 THEN NULL ELSE TRIM(leading 'POINT(' FROM TRIM(trailing ')' FROM st_astext(st_centroid(st_transform(reduce_precision(o.public_geom, false, 1000), 4326))))) END

column.name: map_sq_2km
column.sql: CASE WHEN onf.sensitivity_precision > 2000 THEN NULL ELSE TRIM(leading 'POINT(' FROM TRIM(trailing ')' FROM st_astext(st_centroid(st_transform(reduce_precision(o.public_geom, false, 2000), 4326))))) END

column.name: map_sq_10km
column.sql: CASE WHEN onf.sensitivity_precision > 10000 THEN NULL ELSE TRIM(leading 'POINT(' FROM TRIM(trailing ')' FROM st_astext(st_centroid(st_transform(reduce_precision(o.public_geom, false, 10000), 4326))))) END

column.name: input_sref
column.sql: COALESCE(snf.public_entered_sref, onf.output_sref)

column.name: input_sref_system
column.sql: CASE WHEN snf.public_entered_sref IS NULL THEN onf.output_sref_system ELSE snf.entered_sref_system END

column.name: coordinate_uncertainty_in_meters
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.sensitive=true OR snf.privacy_precision IS NOT NULL OR snf.entered_sref_system NOT SIMILAR TO '[0-9]+' THEN get_sref_precision(onf.output_sref, onf.output_sref_system, null) ELSE COALESCE(snf.attr_sref_precision, 50) END

column.name: indexed_location_ids
column.sql: array_to_string(o.location_ids, ',')

column.name: attr_stage
column.sql: COALESCE(onf.attr_stage, onf.attr_sex_stage)

column.name: attr_sex_stage_count_exact
column.sql: case when onf.attr_sex_stage_count similar to '[0-9]{1,9}' then onf.attr_sex_stage_count::integer else null end

column.name: attr_det_name
column.sql: coalesce(onf.attr_det_full_name, coalesce(onf.attr_det_first_name, '') || ' ' || onf.attr_det_last_name)

column.name: media_data
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.media_count>0 AND o.sensitive=false AND snf.privacy_precision IS NULL THEN (SELECT string_agg(om.path || '~~' || COALESCE(om.caption, '') || '~~' || COALESCE(l.code, '') || '~~' || COALESCE(t.term, ''), '@@') FROM occurrence_media om LEFT JOIN licences l ON l.id=om.licence_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms t ON t.id=om.media_type_id WHERE om.occurrence_id=o.id AND om.deleted=false) ELSE null END

column.name: event_media_data
column.sql: CASE WHEN s.media_count>0 AND s.sensitive=false AND s.private=false THEN (SELECT string_agg(sm.path || '~~' || COALESCE(sm.caption, '') || '~~' || COALESCE(l.code, '') || '~~' || COALESCE(t.term, ''), '@@') FROM sample_media sm LEFT JOIN licences l ON l.id=sm.licence_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms t ON t.id=sm.media_type_id WHERE sm.sample_id=s.id AND sm.deleted=false) ELSE null END

column.name: created_on
column.sql: to_char(o.created_on, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS.MS')

column.name: updated_on
column.sql: to_char(o.updated_on, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS.MS')

column.name: record_substatus
column.sql: coalesce(o.record_substatus, 0)

column.name: verified_on
column.sql: to_char(o.verified_on, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS.MS')

column.name: sensitivity_blur
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.sensitive OR s.private OR o.confidential THEN 'B' ELSE null END

column.name: dna_associated_sequences
column.sql: array_to_string(dnao.associated_sequences, ';')
